meanings.definition: To be mutually dependent on each other.
meanings.sent1: The plants in the garden are interdepending on the sunlight for growth.
meanings.sent2: In a healthy ecosystem, different species interdepend to maintain balance.
meanings.sent3: The two best friends were interdepending on each other to win the dance competition.
meanings.sent4: The success of the project was interdepending on the collaboration of all team members.
meanings.sent5: The survival of the small village was interdepending on the nearby river for water and fish.

meanings.definition: To rely on each other for support or existence.
meanings.sent1: The siblings interdepending on each other to navigate the unfamiliar city.
meanings.sent2: In times of crisis, communities often interdepend to provide aid and assistance.
meanings.sent3: The cats were interdepending on each other to catch the elusive mouse in the house.
meanings.sent4: The success of the mission was interdepending on the teamwork and coordination of the astronauts.
meanings.sent5: The survival of the endangered species was interdepending on conservation efforts and habitat protection.
